hero.name: Chet MITH.
hero.title: Full-Stack Web Developer | Computer Science Major
hero.description: I'm a passionate Full-stack Web Developer with a strong foundation in both frontend and backend technologies. Whether it's designing responsive user interfaces or building scalable APIs, I strive to craft web experiences that are not only functional but meaningful. I believe in continuous learning, collaboration, and building solutions that make an impact.
